page.title: 01WOODLEY
page.content: THE SURVEY HAS BEEN CARRIED OUT BY WOODLEY{C OF E}AND{RIVERMEAD,BEECHWOOD AND{SOUTHLAKE.}IT IS ABOUT A PART OF WOODLEY. WOODLEY IS SITUATED ABOUT{3 MILES ON THE{EASTERN}SIDE OF READING.IT IS QUITE NEAR TO A COUNTRY PARK CALLED DINTON PASTURES AND THE M4. IT IS A MIDDLE CLASS RESIDENTIAL AREA.SOME MORE HOUSES ARE BEING BUILT ON THE OLD AERODROME WHICH WAS USED IN THE {WORLD WAR 2.}THERE IS A BIG SHOPPING AREA IN{CROCKHAMWELL}ROAD.IT MAINLY SELLS FOOD,BUT THERE ARE SOME SHOPS THAT SELL SHOES AND CLOTHES. AN ANNUAL CARNIVAL IS HELD IT ALSO HAS A PROCESSION.IN{JUNE 1985}A {LIBRARY}WAS STARTED TO BE BUILT. THERE ARE ALSO LOCAL{SCOUT}AND{ {GUIDE}TROOPS.
